help_text:
Need assistance? Select an option below
and we'll guide you step by step.
a_recharge_mobile: Go to the Recharge section and select your operator.
q_loan_status: How to check my loan repayment status?
a_loan_status: Go to Loans > My Loans to view repayment details.
q_refer_earn: How does the Refer & Earn program work?
a_refer_earn: Invite friends and earn rewards when they sign up.
q_upi_pin: How to change my UPI PIN?
a_upi_pin: Go to UPI Settings > Change UPI PIN.
a_electricity_bill: Go to the Bills section and select Electricity.
q_add_wallet_money: How to add money to my wallet?
a_cashback_offers: Visit the Offers section to view ongoing cashback deals.
q_block_account: How to block my account in case of fraud?
a_block_account: Go to Security Settings > Block Account.

about_us_para1: Our goal is to make digital payments so easy, safe, and universally accepted that people never feel the need to carry cash or cards again. We believe India is at the cusp of a new mobile revolution, which will change the way we manage our money on the go. We see ourselves facilitating this change, through technology and dogged customer centricity.
company_info: IndiaaPay is a brand owned by {{company}} (CIN - {{cin}}). It is licensed by the Government of India for issuance and operation of a Semi Closed Prepaid Payment system.
grievance_content:
If you have any complaints or grievances, please reach out to us at:

Email: support@indiaapay.com

Address: IndiaaPay Pvt. Ltd., Mumbai, Maharashtra
privacy_content: We value your privacy and are committed to safeguarding your data. This policy outlines the types of personal information we collect and how we use, disclose, and protect that information...
terms_intro: Welcome to IndiaaPay. These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our mobile application...
terms_agreement: By using our Platform, you agree to these Terms...
section_1_text: You must be an individual aged 18 years or older...
section_2a_text: You may use our wallet or linked bank account through UPI for transactions...
section_2c_text: You can transfer money using UPI...
section_2d_text: Property listings are aggregated for your convenience...
section_2e_text: Investment options like mutual funds, gold, fixed deposits...
section_2f_text: Insurance services are offered in partnership...
section_2g_text: We allow flight, hotel, bus, and holiday package bookings...
section_2h_text: We may offer additional digital and financial services...
section_3_text: You must ensure all information provided is accurate...
section_4_text: You may be required to complete KYC verification...
section_5_text: We may charge convenience or service fees...
section_6_text: Refunds are only applicable in the case of failed transactions...
section_7_text: Our services are integrated with third-party APIs...
section_8_text: We collect and use your data as described...
section_9_text: All content, code, and trademarks are owned...
section_10_text: We may suspend or terminate your access...
section_11_text: We are not liable for indirect, incidental...
section_12_text: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless...
section_13_text: These Terms are governed by the laws of India...
